column3: Fake Trap. If activated. discard this card. if destroyed. deal 1 damage to the destroyer
Stun Trap. Haxxor cannot move 1 space on their next turn
Damage trap. deal 1 damage
Discard Card Trap. If activated. Discard a card from the activators hand
Draw Trap. If activated. you draw a card
<Bypass> Negates an ability. Lock this card after use
<Trap> if an entity lands on this structure. Deal 1 DMG to this hexagon and all adjacent hexagons
If activated. the activator skips their next turn
RNG Trap with the use of the digital companion
<Ultimate Trap>  If activated. Lock 1 Card from each of the haxxors hands at randomAll other Ultimate Sentinel Cards now have no effect. discard and redraw if you draw one
<Ultimate Trap>  Can only be used once 5 traps have been sprung. Destroy the haxxor who activates this trap. All other Ultimate Sentinel Cards now have no effect. redraw if you draw one
REACTION: When you are a sentinel. summon a binary bunny
Attack: Deal 1 Damage to adjacent Haxxor
Push: Push an adjacent haxxor or structure one space
Recalibrate: Select an adjacent haxxor structure. it is now a sentinel structure
Heal: Heal 1 DMG to selected target
Choose 1 Haxxor. if there is a Digital next to it. Deal 1 DMG to that haxxor
<Digital>Trap absorption: Jokers absorb the effect of traps they activate. Harlequin Strike: Inflict any absorbed effects onto an adjacent haxxor. reset current stored effects
Select  a Digital. it gains "Attack"
Choose 1 Haxxor and 1 Non-Ultimate Digital. switch their positions

<Ultimate Digital> When spawned it gains the property inevitable. When kronos lands on the player spawn hex. delete this digital and Haxxors are teleported to the player spawn hexs. All other Ultimate Sentinel Cards now have no effect. redraw if you draw one
<Ultimate> Once Per Turn. Summon a Binary Bunny. If there are 5 binary bunnies on the field. all bunnies gain "Attack"  All other Ultimate Sentinel Cards now have no effect. redraw if you draw one
Draw 2 cards. then discard 1 card
Look at the top 3 cards of your deck
Put down 3 structure tokens. they can be destroyed in 1 hit
Put down 1 Structure token. if there are two cyber conduits on the field. then once per turn. you may look at the top card of your deck
Put down 1 structure token on an existing structure. if the structure is attacked. destroy this structure instead
Put down 1 structure token. any entity that lands on this structure token is dealt 1 damage
Put down 1 structure token. all reaction abilities cannot be used while this structure is active
<Ultimate Structure> Once per turn. deal 1 damage to all opponents. All other Ultimate Sentinel Cards now have no effect. redraw if you draw one

<Ultimate Structure> Put down 1 structure token. the structure gets "while active. the owner can draw 1 extra card per turn". All other Ultimate Sentinel Cards now have no effect. redraw if you draw one
You gain the effect "Cannot be attacked" for 1 sentinel turn
Move 1 Space
Select 1 Tier 1 Digital. Deal 1 DMG to it
Select 1 Digital or Structure. Push it 1 space
REACTION: When your character moves. select 1 adjacent Digital or Structure. Deal 1 DMG to it
Negates an ability. Lock this card after use
Target a Digital. they cannot use abilities for 2 turns
Select a Digital. Deal 2 DMG to it
Select a hexagon. Deal 1 DMG to this hexagon and all adjacent hexagons
<Ultimate> You can now move 2 spaces per turn. All other Ultimate Haxxor Cards now have no effect. discard and redraw if you draw one
<Ultimate> Destroy all summoned digitals. your health is now at 1. All other Ultimate Haxxor Cards now have no effect. discard and redraw if you draw one
Select a hexagon. if there is a trap on that hexagon. destroy it
Choose 1 Non-Ultimate Card in the Play pile. return it to the deck and suffle
Choose 1 Card in the sentinel's hand and they have to reveal it.
Look at the top 3 cards of your deck
First team to get a picture of an opposing player's face gets to choose two cards from the opposing hand to be revealed. Start when both sides have their cameras ready
Look at the top 3 cards of the deck and rearrange them in any order
Force sentinel to reveal location of one trap
Choose a card from a sentinel's hand for them to redraw. Sentinels shuffle their deck. You may not see the contents of their cards
<Ultimate> Sentinels now set trap cards face up. All other Ultimate Haxxor Cards now have no effect. discard and redraw if you draw one
<Ultimate> Any digital companions at play are now viewable by all. All other Ultimate Haxxor Cards now have no effect. discard and redraw if you draw one
REACTION: When your character suffers fatal damage. reset your health to 1. this card is then deleted
Draw 2 cards. then discard 1 card
Teleport to a Haxxor hex. and heal 3 hearts
Regain 1 heart next turn
REACTION: Check your phones! If sentinel attacks. whoever has the lower battery level takes the damage.
Select 1 Haxxor. Heal 1 heart to that haxxor
Regain 2 Hearts Instantly
REACTION: Negates effect of a non-ultimate trap
REACTION: When your character is attacked. negate the damage

<Ultimate> REACTION: When your character suffers fatal damage. this card automatically resets your health to 1 and you gain the effect "Cannot be damaged" for 2 sentinel turns. All other Ultimate Haxxor Cards now have no effect. discard and redraw if you draw one
<Ultimate> Select a fallen digital. they revive with 2 Hearts. All other Ultimate Haxxor Cards now have no effect. discard and redraw if you draw one
